name: Chess Play-To-Earn Game
description:
This project is one of the best ones I built. Although, I've worked on it for a very short period of time, it has the best aspects. Including a completely sustainable play to earn strategy. Which includes a multiplayer game where every player deposits a certain amount of money before each game, and the winner receiving the majority of the money.

For example, if you were to play a game with your friend you would both deposit 10$, the winner of the game takes 15$ while we keep 5$ for fees.
